general_advisory: Seeing the clear sky, farmers can apply spraying activities. Farmers can get the crop insurance by calculating the crop loss due to untimely rainfall. The light rainfall will be very essential for the winter crops so farmers can skip the irrigation. Harvested rice crop should be dried in sun, and then threshed & stored in a safe place.

advisory: Make arrangements to prevent water stagnation in the field.
